# HKFitzpatrickSkinTypeObject

**Class**

This class acts as a wrapper for the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKFitzpatrickSkinType] enumeration.

## Declaration

```swift
class HKFitzpatrickSkinTypeObject
```

## Accessing Skin Type Data

- **skinType**: The user’s skin type.

## Classes

- **HKAudiogramSensitivityPointClampingRange**: Defines the range within which an ear’s sensitivity point may have been clamped, if any.
- **HKAudiogramSensitivityTest**
- **HKBiologicalSexObject**: This class acts as a wrapper for the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKBiologicalSex] enumeration.
- **HKBloodTypeObject**: This class acts as a wrapper for the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKBloodType] enumeration.
- **HKGAD7Assessment**
- **HKPHQ9Assessment**
- **HKScoredAssessment**
- **HKScoredAssessmentType**
- **HKStateOfMind**
- **HKStateOfMindType**
- **HKWheelchairUseObject**: This class acts as a wrapper for the wheelchair use enumeration.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
